articles.title: At least 73 people killed waiting for humanitarian aid across Gaza, says Palestinian Health Ministry.
articles.description: At least 73 people were killed while attempting to access aid at locations across Gaza on Sunday (July 20, 2025), with the largest toll in northern Gaza where 67 Palestinians died trying to reach aid entering through the Zikim crossing with Israel. [3] Other reports indicate over 100 Palestinians were killed by Israeli troops, with 37 seeking food from aid centers. [6]
